::FireBlade::
The grenades  bounce harmelessly away as Najah sped away at the sight
of incoming roickets. FireBlade transformed and sped away also...
"he has his hands busy to stay away from me now" he said a s he once
agian spotted that menace Prowl and launched a EMP grenade at him with
more power in his Tank mode..
